content.question: Part A ​​The functions <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> and <math alttext="h"> <mi>h</mi> </math> are given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals e to the power of open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses end exponent"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></math> <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals arcsin open parentheses x over 2 close parentheses"> <mi>h</mi> <mfenced> <mi>x</mi> </mfenced> <mo>=</mo> <mi>arcsin</mi> <mfenced> <mfrac> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </mfenced> </math>. (i) Solve <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 10"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></math> for values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> in the domain of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math>. (ii) Solve <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals pi over 4"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math> for values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> in the domain of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math>.

(i) Solve <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals 10"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></math> for values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> in the domain of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math>. (ii) Solve <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals pi over 4"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math> for values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> in the domain of <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math>.

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities
